title: CURATED WATER
description: CURATED WATER - is an extensive sound library containing 447 unique files of Water (Flowing, Falling, Poured, Spilled, Slapped, Splashed, Bubbles, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions.
longDescription: CURATED WATER - is an extensive sound library containing 447 unique files of Water (Flowing, Falling, Poured, Spilled, Slapped, Splashed, Bubbles, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions ranging from pools, rivers, lakes, beaches, sewers, drains and tubs to melting mountain ice and snow. All of our libraries comply with the Universal Category System metadata naming convention standard. Files are presented in 44.1 kHz / 16 bit (VIDEO GAME).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  447 Unique .wav files of Water in various environments and conditions.
  •  Universal Category System metadata file naming standard.
  •  Royalty-Free.

Number of Audio Waves: 447

Number of Audio Cues: 447

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 384

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/15N5Ycw4l5jLBdGK0sQboOf7-4178tdxa/view?usp=share_link

Demo: https://soundcloud.com/sound-assets/curated-water-demo?si=c03bfa1781e84512af51582469591bc6&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
